dmca.title: Mobipocket Asks Google for Newsgroup Takedown
dmca.body:
Fax number: [private]
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
From - [private] Mobipocket.com
Date: 9/29/02
    
1 . The copyrighted works at issue are all the ebooks that are sold on the www.mobipocket.com website, for example all the ebooks listed on these web pages:
    
http://www.mobipocket.com/EN/eBooks/PublisherDetails.asp?PublisherlD=48
http://www.mobipocket.com/EN/eBooks/PublisherDetails.asp?PublisherID=83
http://www.mobipooket.com/EN/eBooks/PublisherDetails.asp?PublisherlD=89
    
2. The material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above is the following Google newsgroup posting:
    
http://groups.google,com/groups?q=mobipocket+hack&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&selm=aa27cafa.0205021619.5fd3c28d%40posting.google.com&rnum=1

3. Google can contact Mobipocket.com at this email address: [private]@mobipocket.com
    
4. The author of the text that is infringing the copyrighted work in #1 gave this email address [private], but it can't be verified if this is a valid email.
    
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owners of an exclusive right that is infringed.
    
[private]          CEO
